title: ERP System
description: This project is a streamlined interface for an ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) system. Its purpose is to efficiently manage fundamental business operations for small and medium-sized businesses. The interface encompasses features like Dashboard, Product Management, Order Management and a calendar view for business activities.

title: Moviebase
description: Moviebase stands as a premier web application for movie and web show enthusiasts, combining cutting-edge technology with a user-centric design to deliver an unparalleled entertainment exploration experience. Moviebase offers users an immersive experience with seamless data fetching in real-time from The Movie Database (TMDB) API.
